attributes.action: STOP scaremongering weather headlines that cause concern for the vulnerable
attributes.background:
As a weather forecasting group based in the South West, UK South West Storm Chasers often receive queries and questions seeking reassurance from over-exaggerated weather headlines in our papers. 

Let’s have tighter regulations and make sure only REAL forecasts with factual backup can be published

rejection.details:
Complaints about the press are the responsibility of the Independent Press Standards Organisation (IPSO), not  the Government or Parliament. 

You can find out how to make a complaint to IPSO here:

https://www.ipso.co.uk/IPSO/makeacomplaint.html
